6.Pros: The training to management is actually quality. Environment depends due to such a global scale of stores. Decent pay for in between jobs. You will actually be rewarding for working hard and efficient, and the work is already super easy.
6.Cons: The other employees. Employees will continuously gripe, whine and complain about even the most simplest of tasks. The environment is usually pretty rough, would not recommend for someone with alcohol or smoking addictions if they are trying to quite. Employees believe it is okay to come in high, drunk or both. I could go on and on about the employees so to sum it up, needs better hiring managers with a little more skill.
